Package org.hrw.application

package org.hrw.application
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.hrw
     
    org.hrw.userInterface
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Processor
    Coordinates the complete processing workflow: Fetches raw server telemetry data via Collector Hashes the collected data and builds Merkle-related structures via Hasher Persists both raw and hashed data via DatabaseHandler Anchors the calculated hash data in the blockchain using AnchorService
    Processor.ProcessorBuilder
    Builder for constructing Processor instances.
    Scheduler
    Schedules and periodically triggers execution of the Processor.
